channel.title: Music on Hrishik's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Hrishik's Portfolio

item.title: Desi Beats
item.description:
Project Overview

Genre: Rhythm-Based Music Game
Platform: Mobile (Android)
Technologies Used: Unity, C#, Audio Synchronization, Mobile Optimization
Play Store Link

Description

For Desi Beats, a rhythm-based mobile game by Hungama Game Studio, I implemented optimizations that enhanced performance across diverse devices. My contributions also included integrating animations, sound effects, and user-friendly UI elements, and debugging and profiling performance to bolster stability. This work involved close collaboration with the team to refine the overall player experience, particularly focusing on interaction with Indian music tracks.
